document.full_text: google inc chairman eric schmidt and facebook founder mark zuckerberg warned governments to tread lightly on internet regulation because moves to tame its rough edges risked hurting its virtues.
document.title: google, facebook warn on internet rules at e-g8
lines_and_colors: google inc chairman eric schmidt and facebook founder mark zuckerberg warned governments to tread lightly on internet regulation because moves to tame its rough edges risked hurting its virtues.
